identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a unique, high-quality SaaS application for education that breaks the boring LMS mold.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Organic warmth.
Emotion First: Clarity and focus for learning, excitement for discovery.
Content is King: Data and schedules must be legible but beautiful.
Zoom In: Focus on the task at hand (e.g., the next class).

theme_strategy.description: Primary 'Intellectual' Light Mode: Off-white backgrounds with sharp slate text and vibrant orange accents. Dark mode should be deep slate, not pitch black.

primary.name: Burnt Orange
primary.usage: Primary CTAs, Active States, Key Highlights

rules: CRITICAL: Never use pure black (#000000). Use Deep Slate (#0F172A).
CRITICAL: Do not use Teal (#1B93A4) or Purple (#7351B7).
Gradients: Use sparingly. If used, make them subtle noise gradients, not harsh linear ones.
Contrast: Ensure text meets APCA standards. Use dark text on light backgrounds.

headings.rules: Tight tracking (-0.02em). Do NOT use Inter or Space Grotesk.

body.usage: Body text, UI labels, Data tables.
body.rules: Excellent legibility for numbers and small text.

spacing.rules: Use generous padding. Cards should have p-6 or p-8 internal padding.

bento_rules: Ensure full height alignment with h-full

student_dashboard_bg.usage: Subtle background or sidebar image for student view

buttons.primary: bg-orange-600 hover:bg-orange-700 text-white font-medium px-6 py-3 rounded-full shadow-sm transition-transform hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-stone-200 text-slate-900 hover:bg-stone-50 font-medium px-6 py-3 rounded-full transition-colors
buttons.ghost: text-slate-600 hover:text-slate-900 hover:bg-stone-100 px-4 py-2 rounded-lg transition-colors

cards.style: bg-white border border-stone-100 rounded-2xl shadow-card overflow-hidden

inputs.style: bg-stone-50 border-transparent focus:border-orange-500 focus:bg-white focus:ring-2 focus:ring-orange-100 rounded-lg h-12 px-4 transition-all

calendar.style: Shadcn Calendar heavily customized. Remove default heavy borders. Use rounded selection states. Active day: bg-orange-600 text-white.

toasts.style: Clean white toast with slate text.

sections: Hero: Asymmetrical grid. Text left, large image right with floating 'Live Class' badge.
Features: Bento grid showing 'Schedule', 'Video Library', 'Live Meet'.
Social Proof: 'Trusted by' logos (use placeholders or generic text if logos missing).
CTA: Large banner with Burnt Orange background.

scheduling.layout: Split view. Left: Calendar/Date Picker. Right: Available Slots (Slot Picker style).
scheduling.interaction: Click date -> Slots appear -> Click slot -> Confirm.

video_library.layout: Grid of video thumbnails with 'Play' overlay.

universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic outputs. Avoid this.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition (transition: all).
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: Read this JSON. Install 'lucide-react' and 'framer-motion' if missing. Use the defined color palette in tailwind.config.js. Build the 'Intellectual' theme. Focus on the 'Bento' grid for the dashboard and 'Slot Picker' for scheduling. Use the provided image URLs.
